actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-5.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #6 (256-103).

official_title: A resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations, and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Armed Services.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-5) Authorizes expenditures by the House Committee on Armed Services for investigations and studies not to exceed $677,000. Declares that no part of such funds shall be available for expenditure in connection with the study of any subject being investigated for the same purpose by any other House Committee. Terminates the funds authorized by this resolution on January 3, 1980.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations, and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Armed Services.
